application_details: Blood Tribe Council acted under a custom election bylaw to remove the Chief
decision_reasoning: The council is a federal board subject to its jurisdiction
result_of_case: court has jurisdiction and granted an interlocutory injunction preserving the status quo until November 2, 1993
procedure_steps: Interim injunctions were issued, followed by hearings and applications for interlocutory relief
conclusion_outcome: The court upheld its jurisdiction, continued the injunction, and encouraged alternative dispute resolution methods
